q: " Dwaine Caraway said. It came up that Kiss lead singer Gene Simmons got a key to the city last week for supporting the troops. Dwaine Caraway said that supports him giving a key to Michael Vick . He is supporting the troops, I am supporting the children, he said. Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick the key during an event at Club Cirque that was attended by children who came to hear Michael Vick 's story. Dwaine Caraway said he would do it all over again

DOE funding will help Veeco to speed up its efforts to commercialise multi-stage thermal deposition production systems used to manufacture cost-efficient CIGS Solar cells. Commenting on the Veeco award, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-NY) said, Developing new, clean, homegrown sources of energy is a vital part of our economic recovery. This federal investment will help drive research and development of new solar power technology, helping make solar power more efficient. By making solar power more effective and affordable over the long term, we can cut emissions,

"All of a sudden she started to struggle to open her eyes. And so Mark saw that and said--` open your eyes, Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes," recalled Kirsten Gillibrand . She kept struggling and struggling and Mark kept encouraging her. And with in a moment she literally opened her eyes. The doctor was unbelievably excited because this was such great progress. Kirsten Gillibrand became close with Gabrielle Giffords during their time together in the House of Representatives. The senator says she told Gabrielle Giffords that people are pulling for her and are inspired by her courage.

network show called " Oprah Winfrey Presents Master Class" delves into Simon Cowell 's childhood and gives him a chance to reflect on why he has become so successful. In her introduction, Oprah Winfrey says Simon Cowell has made his mark by going against the grain and having the courage to say exactly what is on his mind. "I'm not a master of anything," says Simon Cowell . "I think what I'm good at is making shows or records which a lot of people will like for the same reasons I

engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last February- admits he struggles to relate to very young kids, but would love to have youngsters of his own to play games with. He said: I worry about it- because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70. "Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. I like them at that age when they can talk and understand. I'm not sure I could deal with the whole "ga ga goo' thing. But I genuinely like kids. Simon Cowell also admitted Mezhgan, 36, has "softened" him and has finally made him think about settling down forever.
